posts.post_content:
The following cards are for sale or trade. If wanting to trade I'm looking for Johnny Evers cards I don't have or T213-2 HOFers. Any questions email 
[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Feel free to make an offer if you feel my prices are outrageous. 



T3 Lajoie-$1750
T216 Tinker(thin type)-$775

T3 Bender-SOLD
T206 Powers-SOLD
T206 Lajoie port(horizontal crease at bottom)SOLD
T206 Rucker(two fact. #'s)-SOLD
